name: 酉閃町 Dusk Diver
description:
Dusk Diver is a 3D-action game. The players play the role of a high school girl - Yang Yumo to travel between the real world and another world, fighting against Phantoms with Guardians.



The real world – Ximending where the players can explore to power-up Yumo and progress the story.

Another world－Youshanding where the players fight against Phantoms in order to protect Ximending.

■ Various moves with the combination of light and heavy attacks.
■ Summon Guardians timely , and eliminate enemies by using the Special attack.
■ Choose the right Guardian at the right situation.




■ The map that based on the real city in Taiwan.
■ Switch Combo - the battle system of Yumo and three Guardians.
■ Japanese/Chinese voiceover.
